row1.title: Encore
row1.description:
Encore is a playable Fusion Congenital Resonator in Wuthering Waves.
 She is from the New Federation and is a Consultant of the Black Shores. 

 Encore bears a Tacet Mark on her upper back, and Post-Awakening examinations have revealed minor physical mutations, including wool-like hair tips. In times of heightened emotional states, she may also manifest sheep-like horns, requiring caution from testing personnel.

row1.title: Verina
row1.description:
Verina is a playable Spectro Congenital Resonator in Wuthering Waves.
She is a botanist from the New Federation who dwells in Huanglong.

Verina's resonance frequency shows an increasing trend over time, leading to speculation that her Forte abilities will also continue to strengthen with age. The extent of this growth is still being monitored.

row2.title: Changli
row2.description:
Changli (Chinese: 长离) is an upcoming Fusion Resonator in Wuthering Waves.
She is the counselor of Jinzhou Magistrate. Changli excels at leveraging human nature to corner her enemies into traps. Being the mentor to Jinhsi, Changli is persuasive and patient. She entertains an unwavering aspiration, holding her ground in the endless game against time and chaos.

row3.title: Yinlin
row3.description:
Yinlin (Chinese: 吟霖) is a playable Electro Congenital Resonator in Wuthering Waves. She was previously an outstanding Jinzhou Patroller, known for being steady and reliable.

 Yinlin is a tall woman with a pale skin tone. Her eyes are purple, fading into a magenta tone with white pupils and her long hair is a bright red, pinned into a high bun.


 Yinlin's attire is a red-black modified qipao with gold and dull blue accents. Her dress has side slits and an opening in the center of her chest and abdomen, revealing a dark sleeveless bodysuit underneath. She complements her outfit with long black gloves with golden details and red palms, and a singular black earring. As for footwear, she opts for black heels with a golden platform and red trim.
